name: Auto-Creation of Compliance Records from Focus System
description: Compliance records are automatically created via API integration when new compliance entries are created in Focus system, with auto-populated fields and compliance dashboard management

background.text: I am on the compliance application
I am logged in as an Alliant Admin
the Focus system API integration is active

scenarios.name: New compliance record automatically created from Focus system

steps.text: a new compliance entry is created in Focus system
the API integration processes the new entry
a new compliance record should be automatically created
the record should appear in the Compliance Dashboard list view
the Overall Status should be set to "non-compliant" by default

scenarios.name: All required fields populated from Focus system data

steps.text: a compliance entry exists in Focus with complete data
the record is automatically created
the "First Name" field should be populated from Focus
the "Last Name" field should be populated from Focus
the "Company Name" field should be populated from Focus
the "Contractor ID" field should be populated from Focus
the "Email ID" field should be populated from Focus

scenarios.name: COI attachments automatically transferred from Focus

steps.text: a Focus compliance entry has COI documents in the Attachments Tab
the compliance record is auto-created
the COI attachments should be automatically included
the attachments should be accessible in the compliance record
the attachment metadata should be preserved

scenarios.name: Auto-populated fields cannot be manually edited

steps.text: I am viewing an auto-created compliance record
I attempt to edit the "First Name" field
the field should be read-only
I attempt to edit the "Contractor ID" field
the field should be read-only
all auto-populated fields should remain non-editable

scenarios.name: Back Office user can edit requirements and attachments

steps.text: I am logged in as a Back Office user
I am viewing an auto-created compliance record
I update the requirements section
I add additional attachments
I click the "Save" button
the requirements should be updated successfully
the new attachments should be saved

scenarios.name: Default non-compliant status applied to new records

steps.text: multiple compliance records are auto-created from Focus
I view the Compliance Dashboard
all new records should display "non-compliant" status
the status should be clearly visible in the list view
the records should be available for review and status updates

scenarios.name: Manual creation of compliance records is blocked

steps.text: I am on the Compliance Dashboard
I look for manual record creation options
there should be no "Add New" or "Create" button available
no manual creation functionality should be accessible through the UI

scenarios.name: API integration failure prevents record creation

steps.text: the Focus system API is temporarily unavailable
a new compliance entry is created in Focus
the record should not be created in the compliance system
an appropriate error should be logged
the system should attempt to retry the integration

scenarios.name: Incomplete Focus data prevents successful record creation

steps.text: a Focus compliance entry is missing required fields
the API attempts to create the compliance record
the record creation should fail
a validation error should be recorded
the incomplete record should not appear in the dashboard

scenarios.name: Unauthorized user cannot edit auto-populated fields

steps.text: I am logged in as a user without edit permissions
I am viewing an auto-created compliance record
I attempt to modify any auto-populated field
I should receive an access denied message
the field values should remain unchanged

scenarios.name: Duplicate Focus entries do not create multiple records

steps.text: a compliance record already exists for a contractor
the same Focus entry is processed again
no duplicate record should be created
the existing record should remain unchanged
a duplicate prevention log should be recorded

scenarios.name: Large attachment files from Focus system handled properly

steps.text: a Focus entry contains attachments exceeding the size limit
the system attempts to transfer the attachments
the system should handle the large files appropriately
an appropriate message should indicate file size constraints
the compliance record should still be created with other data

scenarios.name: Record creation with special characters in contractor data

steps.text: a Focus entry contains special characters in contractor names
the compliance record is auto-created
the special characters should be properly preserved
the record should display correctly in the dashboard
no character encoding issues should occur

gherkin_content:
Feature: Auto-Creation of Compliance Records from Focus System
  Compliance records are automatically created via API integration when new compliance entries are created in Focus system, with auto-populated fields and compliance dashboard management

  Background:
    Given I am on the compliance application
    And I am logged in as an Alliant Admin
    And the Focus system API integration is active

  @smoke @positive @api-integration
  Scenario: New compliance record automatically created from Focus system
    Given a new compliance entry is created in Focus system
    When the API integration processes the new entry
    Then a new compliance record should be automatically created
    And the record should appear in the Compliance Dashboard list view
    And the Overall Status should be set to "non-compliant" by default

  @positive @data-mapping
  Scenario: All required fields populated from Focus system data
    Given a compliance entry exists in Focus with complete data
    When the record is automatically created
    Then the "First Name" field should be populated from Focus
    And the "Last Name" field should be populated from Focus
    And the "Company Name" field should be populated from Focus
    And the "Contractor ID" field should be populated from Focus
    And the "Email ID" field should be populated from Focus

  @positive @attachments
  Scenario: COI attachments automatically transferred from Focus
    Given a Focus compliance entry has COI documents in the Attachments Tab
    When the compliance record is auto-created
    Then the COI attachments should be automatically included
    And the attachments should be accessible in the compliance record
    And the attachment metadata should be preserved

  @positive @field-protection
  Scenario: Auto-populated fields cannot be manually edited
    Given I am viewing an auto-created compliance record
    When I attempt to edit the "First Name" field
    Then the field should be read-only
    When I attempt to edit the "Contractor ID" field
    Then the field should be read-only
    And all auto-populated fields should remain non-editable

  @positive @user-permissions
  Scenario: Back Office user can edit requirements and attachments
    Given I am logged in as a Back Office user
    And I am viewing an auto-created compliance record
    When I update the requirements section
    And I add additional attachments
    And I click the "Save" button
    Then the requirements should be updated successfully
    And the new attachments should be saved

  @positive @status-management
  Scenario: Default non-compliant status applied to new records
    Given multiple compliance records are auto-created from Focus
    When I view the Compliance Dashboard
    Then all new records should display "non-compliant" status
    And the status should be clearly visible in the list view
    And the records should be available for review and status updates

  @negative @access-control
  Scenario: Manual creation of compliance records is blocked
    Given I am on the Compliance Dashboard
    When I look for manual record creation options
    Then there should be no "Add New" or "Create" button available
    And no manual creation functionality should be accessible through the UI

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: API integration failure prevents record creation
    Given the Focus system API is temporarily unavailable
    When a new compliance entry is created in Focus
    Then the record should not be created in the compliance system
    And an appropriate error should be logged
    And the system should attempt to retry the integration

  @negative @data-validation
  Scenario: Incomplete Focus data prevents successful record creation
    Given a Focus compliance entry is missing required fields
    When the API attempts to create the compliance record
    Then the record creation should fail
    And a validation error should be recorded
    And the incomplete record should not appear in the dashboard

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Unauthorized user cannot edit auto-populated fields
    Given I am logged in as a user without edit permissions
    And I am viewing an auto-created compliance record
    When I attempt to modify any auto-populated field
    Then I should receive an access denied message
    And the field values should remain unchanged

  @edge-case @data-integrity
  Scenario: Duplicate Focus entries do not create multiple records
    Given a compliance record already exists for a contractor
    When the same Focus entry is processed again
    Then no duplicate record should be created
    And the existing record should remain unchanged
    And a duplicate prevention log should be recorded

  @edge-case @file-handling
  Scenario: Large attachment files from Focus system handled properly
    Given a Focus entry contains attachments exceeding the size limit
    When the system attempts to transfer the attachments
    Then the system should handle the large files appropriately
    And an appropriate message should indicate file size constraints
    But the compliance record should still be created with other data

  @edge-case @character-encoding
  Scenario: Record creation with special characters in contractor data
    Given a Focus entry contains special characters in contractor names
    When the compliance record is auto-created
    Then the special characters should be properly preserved
    And the record should display correctly in the dashboard
    And no character encoding issues should occur
